replies.body: Hey there, I want to help but need a little more info.  What item are you trying to interact with exactly?  Are you getting error messages, and what does it say?

If it's to any help, I encountered the same problem after receiving one of those champion capsules.
Nothing was happening clicking on it, and the UI window wouldn't show up until I restarted the client.
Can you please tell me why I only got rengar from the capsule? Only one champion in my capsule, why?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=U0XXPky1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-10T19:15:35.676+0000)
>
> Hey there, I want to help but need a little more info.  What item are you trying to interact with exactly?  Are you getting error messages, and what does it say?

Uh, nevermind, sorry. I don't know why, but earlier when I made this post nothing popped up when I tried to open the capsule. But right now, about 7 hours later, it works.
Hello i got problem, i can't open champion capsule. What to do ?
